body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0002]/events[at0003]/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/value as T0_weight
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.body_weight.v2]
  )
WHERE
 a/data[at0002]/events[at0003]/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/value/magnitude > $weight  
 AND
 a/data[at0002]/events[at0003]/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/value/units = $unit
 

ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
LIMIT
  1
